name: SMD 2
description:
Shells of Mass Destruction 2 is the sequel to award-winning hit Shells of Mass Destruction.

Play as over one (1) character as you explore brilliantly handcrafted Italian-made levels with intense puzzle solving such as "talk to this thing and then talk to this other thing" or "talk to this thing and then walk right".

Look, I tried my best, ok. Art is all default assets from Wolf RPG and the music is all mine, linked on this page.
